about_the_game:
EGG FLY is a vertical platformer based on physics. All you need is a mouse, control the distance between the mouse and the character and lead the character all the way up to the top by clicking at a reasonable pace.

Game play
The movement and jump of the character is based on physics, so you need to have good control of the position and rhythm of the click to control the movement and jump of the character.
Level design
We carefully designed different types of levels, from the easy to the deep, step by step the challenge of high difficulty.
The background music
We carefully selected a variety of background music, to help you relax, more happy to play the game.
Subsequent progress
We will continue to update new chapters with new themes and new challenges.

If you want to change the mouse, but do not have a good excuse, please start the game as soon as possible.
If you want to test your patience and don't have a testing tool, start playing as soon as possible.
If you want to learn about physics, err.......... Go to school, please.

name: EGG FLY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTS 450
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: EGG · FLY is a super difficult physical platformer jumping game, by moving the mouse position and reasonable mouse click speed, control the jump height and direction, believe that you have enough patience and skill to complete the challenge.
